content.rendered:
Our Story

Za'atar & Zza'ss was inspired by a trip to New York’s bustling ramen bars, all the way back in 2012. Opening its doors in 2016, the restaurant quickly became a favourite amongst locals and tourists.

We like to focus our menu on dishes that are Asian-fusion in style, filled with with fresh ingredients that are seasonal and locally sourced. In fact, most of our suppliers are within close proximity and on a small scale – these are partnerships that have turned into longstanding friendships.

We like to think that our menu has something for everyone, including plant-based items that are just as popular as some of our meat-based dishes. Every dish brings a sense of balance and distinct flavour. We are especially proud of our noodles, which have been created from scratch, especially for us. As a family-friendly establishment, we look forward to hosting you and providing you with the unique Za'atar & Zza's’s experience.

Instagram

Next-Level Greens…

Keep up the good work this week with fresh, nutritious and healthy dishes – like this delicious and extremely nourishing Asian Spinach Goma-ae.

Imagine an unforgettable combo of baby spinach and sesame dressing. Going green never tasted this good!

🙉🙈🙊

Open

Starter-For-One

Though this tempura Panko prawn starter can be shared, we can guarantee that you won’t want to! One bite of this crispy prawn, dipped into either our sweet chilli or black bean sauce, and you’ll forget about everyone else – it’s just you and the prawns!

Is this a favourite of yours? Let us know in the comments ⬇️

🙊🙈🙉

Open

Sushi Satisfaction…

Cape Townians will know that there is nothing more satisfying than sitting down to a fresh platter of sushi.

We have everything from Rainbow Reloaded to Crispy Salmon Rolls and even a secret Sushi Donut!

Come get your sushi fix this weekend!

zzas.co.za

🙉🙈🙊

Open

Poké – The Wellness Wonder

Bursting full of colourful, healthy ingredients, our poké are packed with disease-preventing and anti-ageing fruits and veggies. A delicious combination that is made to your specifications.

Order yours in-house or enjoy one wherever you find yourself – simply use @mrdfood or @ubereats_za
